question: [Calm] Svenska: Ange which integer bin occurs most frequently utifran histogrammet.

qas.question: [Calm] Svenska: Ange which integer bin occurs most frequently utifran histogrammet.
[Check] Italiano: Riporta how many samples were used in total dal istogramma.
[Brief] Deutsch: Gib how many entries fall inside the modal bin anhand des Histogramms an.
